name: Satmojis
description:
Satmojis is an open-supply CC0 collection of animated pop art emoticons inscribed directly onto Bitcoin via Ordinals. Extremely lean 500 byte hand-drawn fine art GIFs which serve as a decentralized, permissionless emoji or reaction GIF library on Bitcoin Ordinals. They are the first Bitcoin sticker pack & are also indexed across all web2 apps via the artist, AKLO's verified GIPHY & TENOR accounts which power the gif libraries of Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Telegram, Discord & more. Brought to you by 
@PxPushers
